subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jadeveon Clowney is out for at least nine months after microfracture surgery, and the Texans, who drafted him No. 1 over all, may never see him regain his form.
snippet: Jadeveon Clowney is out for at least nine months after microfracture surgery, and the Texans, who drafted him No. 1 over all, may never see him regain his form.
